title: I dont want my border anymore
body:
I dont want it at all.

My play no longer reflects my last seasons rank.

I feel like every game im doomed to be flamed and made fun of unless i hard carry the game.

If i ever play with friends, dont play seriously or just want to have a relaxed game and have fun, and yes sometimes i play bad woah.

I mean do i just have to whole lobby mute every game? Thats kind of sad tbh

Thoughts???

TLDR; sick of people flaming me for not meeting their expectations.

replies.body:
Will support really do that? Im considering it, because getting back to that level is nigh impossible due to real life.

Again though the kind of community/world we live in where i have to do that is rather sad dont we think?

heres a crazy thought

maybe don't care about what losers a) you don't know b) nor will probably never meet say about you over a game.
Simply play with more friends and don't play so much solo. You're friends will become familiar to your play style and generally wont flame you for wanting to have a chill game x)
Contact support and they can remove it.

I don't deserve my silver boarder either, I've been hard stuck in bronze since the start of the season and it doesn't stop people from saying "This is why you will never get out of bronze" {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

i finished b5 last season so no border for me

winning!

I feel the exact way (except I'd rather have my border to remind me how far I've gotten). Even in normal games where I tend to chill and troll around (in a good way) people seem to expect so much from us because of our borders.  Just because you're a in a specific elo doesnt mean you have to be try hard or be god like in every god damm f-ing game like people please! Staph.  The fact that it builds up inside kills me mentally and mechanically T^T <- my tiny rant D:

Either:
a) Contact Support to remove it
b) Finish this season in Bronze (or in a division lower than what is currently on your border)
c) Get better so you feel like you deserve your current border
or d) Get even better so you have a better border
just stop playing league then. problem solved.
